#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,small;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    { small=0;
        int n,i,j,count;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int A[n];
        int B[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%d",&A[i]);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            count=0;
            for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            if(i==j)
                  continue;
            if(j>i)
            {
                if(A[j]!=A[i]+(j-i))
                  {
                    count++;
                    //printf("a[I] is %d and a[j] is %d j and i are %d %d",A[i],A[j],j,i);
                    continue;
                  }
            }
            if(j<i)
            {
                if(A[j]!=A[i]+j-i)
                   {//printf("a[I] is %d and a[j] is %d j and i are %d %d",A[i],A[j],j,i);
                       count++; continue;
                   }
            }
        }
 
            B[i]=count;
        }
        small=B[0];
            for(i=1;i<n;i++)
                if(B[i]<small)
                    small=B[i];
                printf("%d\n",small);
    }
    return 0;
}
